item.title: Curl type download in Ansible
item.description: - name: Download drush phar file (8.3.0) become: yes get_url: url: https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/releases/download/8.3.0/drush.phar dest: /usr/local/bin mode: +x checksum: sha256:ddfe6d529e44e98c2cf74c143c1fcdf67c927d6f9a5eb2ae10fbe47ef9b8eaf0 group: root owner: root See get_url module in https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/modules/get_url_module.html
